pages.text: $(mod)Rechiseled$() adds a very large amount of decorative blocks, using vanilla blocks as a base.$(br2)Right-click a $(item)Chisel$() to open it. Place a block that can be chiseled inside, choose the version you want, then click the Chisel button.
You can see 3 previews of what the block looks like when placed in various shapes. You can also toggle whether or not the textures connect with each other.
